name: Afghooey
description: Also known as Afgoo, Afghooey buds are light,Â fluffy, and heavily laden with a crystal coating of trichomes. Working this marijuana in your hand can become a very sticky situation. Smoking Afghooey provides you with a best of both worlds indica & sativa high.
